p: #Brave, seeking war and booty, dwelling with the good and with the swift. May he hasten the #food of @Dawn. May he the true, the fleet, the lover of the course, the #bird-like @Dadhikravan, bring #food, strength, and #light.

p: His pinion, rapid runner, fans him m his way, as of a #bird that hastens onward to its aim, and, as it were a falcon's gliding through the #air, strikes @Dadhikravan's side as he speeds on with #might.

p: Bound by the neck and by the flanks and by the mouth, the vigorous Courser lends new swiftness to his speed. Drawing himself together, as his strength allows, #Dadhikras springs along the windings of the paths.

p: The Hamsa homed in #light, the @Vasu in $$Mid-#Air, the #Sage beside the altar, in the house the guest, Dweller in noblest place, mid #men, in truth, in $Sky, #born of flood, kine, truth, mountain, he is holy Law.

hymns.title: HYMN XLI. Indra-Varuna.
hymns.text:
p: WHAT laud, O @Indra-@Varuna, with oblation, hath like the #Immortal Monk obtained your favour? Hath our effectual laud, addressed with homage, touched you, O @Indra-@Varuna, in #spirit?

p: He who with dainty #food hath won you, @Indra and @Varuna, #Devas, as his allies to friendship, Slayeth the #Vrtras and his foes in battles, and through your #mighty favours is made famous.

p: @Indra and @Varuna are most liberal givers of #treasure. to the #men who toil to serve them, when they, as #Friends inclined to friendship, honoured with dainty #food, #delight in flowing #Soma.

p: @Indra and @Varuna, ye hurl, O #Mighty, on him your strongest flashing bolt of thunder Who treats us ill, the robber and oppressor: measure on him your overwhelming vigour.

p: O @Indra-@Varuna, be ye the lovers of this my #song, as #steers who love the milch-#Cow. Mil. May it yield us as, gone forth to pasture, the great #Cow pouring out her thousand #rivers.

p: For fertile fields, for worthy #sons and grandsons, for the #Sun's #beauty and for steer-like vigour, may @Indra-@Varuna with gracious favours #work marvels for us in the stress of battle.

p: For you, as Princes, for your ancient kindness, good comrades of the #man who seeks for booty, We choose to us for the dear bond of friendship, most liberal #Heroes bringing #bliss like #parents.

p: Showing their strength, these hymns for grace, free-givers I have gone to you, devoted, as to battle. For #glory have they gone, as #milk to #Soma, to @Indra-@Varuna my thoughts and praises.

p: To @Indra and to @Varuna, desirous of gaining #wealth have these my thoughts proceeded. They have come nigh to you as #treasure.-lovers, like mares, fleet-footed, eager for the #glory.

p: May we ourselves be lords of during #riches, of ample sustenance for #car and hones. May the Twain who #work with newest assists bring yoked teams hitherward to us and #riches.

p: Come with your #mighty assists, O ye #Mighty; come, @Indra-@Varuna, to us in battle. What time the flashing arrows play in combat. May we through you be winners in the contest.

hymns.title: HYMN XLIL Indra-Varuna.
hymns.text:
p: I AM the royal Ruler, mine is empire, as mine who sway all #life are all Immortals. @Varuna's will the #Devas obey and follow. I am the #King of #men's most lofty cover.

p: I am #King @Varuna. To me were given these first existing high celestial #powers. @Varuna's will the #Devas obey and follow. I am the #King of #men's most lofty cover.

p: I @Varuna am @Indra: in their greatness, these the two wide deep fairly-fashioned regions, these the two world-halves have I, even as @Tvastar knowing all beings, joined and held together.

p: I made to #flow the moisture-shedding #waters, and set the $Heaven firm in the scat of #Order. By Law the #Son of @Aditi, Law Observer, hath spread abroad the world in threefold measure.

p: #Heroes with noble #horses, fain for battle, selected warriors, #call on me in combat. I @Indra @Indra, @Indra, @Varuna, and @Mitra, #Soma, @Maghavan, @Savitar, @Visnu, excite the conflict; I stir the dust, #Lord of surpassing vigour.

p: All this I did. The #Devas’ own conquering power never impedeth me whom none opposeth. When lauds and #Soma #juice have made me joyful, both the unbounded regions are affrighted.

p: All beings know these deeds of thine thou tellest this unto @Varuna, thou great Disposer! Thou art renowned as having slain the #Vrtras. Thou madest #flow the floods that were obstructed.

p: Our #fathers then were these, the Seven his, what time the #son of Durgaha was captive. For her they gained by #offering Trasadasyu, a demi-god, like @Indra, conquering foemen.

p: The #spouse of Purukutsa gave oblations to you, O @Indra-@Varuna, with homage. Then unto her ye gave #King Trasadasyu, the demi-god, the slayer of the foeman.

p: May we, possessing much, #delight in #riches, #Devas in oblations and the kine in pasture; And that Milch-#cow who shrinks not from the milking, O @Indra-@Varuna, give to us daily.

hymns.title: HYMN XLIII. Asvins.
hymns.text:
p: WHO will hear, who of those who merit #worship, which of all #Devas take pleasure in our homage? On whose heart shall we lay this laud celestial, rich with fair #offerings, dearest to Immortals?

p: Who will be gracious? Who will come most quickly of all the #Devas? Who will bring #bliss most largely? What #car do they #call swift with rapid coursers? That which the Daughter of the #Sun elected.

p: So many days do ye come swiftly hither, as @Indra to give #help in stress of battle. Descended from the $Sky, divine, #strong-pinioned, by which of all your #powers are ye most #mighty?

p: What is the prayer that we should bring you, @Asvins, whereby ye come to us when invocated? Whether of you confronts e’en great betrayal? Lovers of sweetness, Dasras, #help and save us.

p: In the wide space your chariot reacheth $Heaven, what time it turneth hither from the $Ocean. Sweets from your sweet shall drop, lovers of sweetness! These have they dressed for you as dainty #offerings.

p: Let @Sindhu with his wave bedew your #horses: in fiery glow have the red birds come hither. Observed of all was that your rapid going, whereby ye were the Lords of @Surya's Daughter.

p: Whene’er I gratified you here together, your grace was given us, O ye rich in booty. Protect, ye Twain, the #singer of your praises: to you, @Nasatyas, is my wish directed.

hymns.title: HYMN XLIV. Asvins.
hymns.text:
p: WE will invoke this day your #car, far-spreading, O @Asvins, even the gathering, of the sunlight. #Car praised in hymns, most ample, rich in #treasure., fitted with seats, the #car that beareth @Surya.

p: @Asvins, ye gained that #glory by your @Deva.ead, ye #Sons of $Heaven, by your own #might and power. #Food followeth close upon your bright appearing when stately #horses in your chariot draw you.

p: Who bringeth you to-day for #help with offered oblation, or with hymns to drink the juices? Who, for  'the #offering's ancient lover, turneth you hither, @Asvins, #offering homage?

p: Borne on your golden #car, ye omnipresent! come to this #offering of ours, @Nasatyas. Drink of the pleasant liquor of the #Soma give #riches to the #people who adore you.

p: Come hitherward to us from $Earth, from $Heaven, borne on your golden chariot rolling lightly. Suffer not other #worshippers to stay you here are ye bound by earlier bonds of friendship.

p: Now for us both, mete out, O Wonder-Workers, #riches exceeding great with store of #heroes, because the #men have sent you #praise, O @Asvins, and @Ajamilhas come to the laudation.

p: Whene’er I gratified you here together, your grace was given us, O ye rich in booty. Protect, ye Twain, the #singer of your praises: to you, @Nasatyas, is my wish directed.

hymns.title: HYMN XLV. Asvins
hymns.text:
p: YONDER goes up that #light: your chariot is yoked that travels round upon the summit of this $Heaven. Within this #car are stored three kindred shares of #food, and a skin filled with #meath is rustling as the fourth.

p: Forth come your #offerings rich with store of pleasant #meath, and #cars and #horses at the flushing of the @Dawn, Stripping the covering from the surrounded gloom, and spreading through $$Mid-#Air bright radiance like the #Sun.

p: Drink of the #meath with lips accustomed to the draught; harness for the #meath's sake the chariot that ye love. Refresh the way ye go, refresh the paths with #meath: hither, O @Asvins, bring the skin that holds the #meath.

p: The #swans ye have are friendly, rich in store of #meath, #gold-pinioned, #strong to draw, awake at early morn, Swimming the flood, exultant, fain for draughts that #cheer: ye come like flies to our #libations of the #meath.

p: Well knowing solemn rites and rich in #meath, the fires sing to the #morning @Asvins at the break of day, when with pure hands the prudent energetic priest hath with the stones pressed out the #Soma rich in #meath.

p: The rays advancing nigh, chasing with day the gloom, spread through the $Firmament bright radiance like the #Sun; And the #Sun harnessing his #horses goeth forth: ye through your @Deva.ike nature let his paths be known.

p: Devout in thought I have declared, O @Asvins, your chariot with good #steeds, which lasts forever, Wherewith ye travel swiftly through the regions to the prompt #worshipper who brings oblation.

hymns.title: HYMN XLVI. Vayu. Indra and Vayu
hymns.text:
p: DRINK the best draught of #Soma-#juice, O @Vayu, at our holy rites: For thou art he who drinketh first.

p: Come, team-drawn, with thy hundred helps, with @Indra, seated in the #car, @Vayu, and drink your fill of #juice.

p: May #steeds a thousand bring you both, @Indra. and @Vayu, hitherward #Soma, to the feast.

p: For ye, O @Indra and @Vayu, mount the golden-seated #car that aids The #offering, that reaches $Heaven.

p: On far-refulgent chariot come unto the #man who #offers #gifts: Come, @Indra and @Vayu, hitherward.

p: Here, @Indra and @Vayu, is the #juice: drink it, accordant with the #Devas, within the giver's dwelling-place.

p: Hither, O @Indra and @Vayu, be your #journey here unyoke your #steeds. Here for your draught of #Soma #juice.

hymns.title: HYMN XLVIL Vayu. Indra and Vayu.
hymns.text:
p: @Vayu, the bright is offered thee, best of the #meath at holy rites. Come thou to drink the #Soma #juice, @Deva, longed-for, on thy team-drawn #car.

p: O @Vayu, thou and @Indra are meet drinkers of these #Soma-draughts, for unto you the #drops proceed as #waters gather to the vale.

p: O @Indra and @Vayu, #mighty Twain, speeding together, Lords of Strength, Come to our assist with your team, that y. May drink the #Soma #juice.

p: The longed-for teams which ye possess, O #Heroes, for the #worshipper, Turn to us, @Indra and @Vayu, ye to whom  'the #offering is paid.

hymns.title: HYMN XLVIII. Vayu.
hymns.text:
p: TASTE #offerings never tasted yet, as bards enjoy the foeman's #wealth. O @Vayu, on refulgent #car come to the drinking of the #juice.

p: Removing curses, drawn by teams, with @Indra, seated by thy side, O @Vayu, on refulgent #car come to the drinking of the #juice.

p: The two dark #treasure.es of #wealth that wear all beauties wait on thee. O @Vayu, on refulgent #car come to the drinking of the #juice.

p: May nine-and-ninety harnessed #steeds who yoke them at thy will bring thee. O @Vayu, on refulgent #car come to the drinking of the #juice.

p: Harness, O @Vayu, to thy #car a hundred well-fed tawny #steeds, Yea, or a thousand #steeds, and let thy chariot come to us with #might.

hymns.title: HYMN XLIX. Indra-Narasamsa.
hymns.text:
p: DEAR is this #offering in your mouth, O @Indra and @Narasamsa: Famed is the laud, the gladdening draught.

p: This lovely #Soma is effused, O @Indra and @Narasamsa, for you, to drink it and rejoice.

p: As #Soma-drinkers to our house come, @Indra and @Narasamsa-and @Indra-to drink #Soma #juice.

p: Vouchsafe us #riches hundredfold, O @Indra, and @Narasamsa, with store of #horses, thousandfold.

p: O @Indra. and @Narasamsa, we #call you when the #meath is shed, with #songs, to drink the #Soma #juice.

p: Drink, @Indra and @Narasamsa, the #Soma in the giver's house: #Delight yourselves abiding there.

hymns.title: HYMN L. Narasamsa.
hymns.text:
p: Him who with #might hath propped $Earth's ends, who sitteth in threefold seat, @Narasamsa, with thunderhim of the pleasant tongue have ancient sages, deep-thinking, holy singers, set before them.

p: Wild in their course, in well-marked #wise rejoicing were they, @Narasamsa, who pressed around us. Preserve @Narasamsa, the stall uninjured, this company's raining, ever-moving birthplace.

p: @Narasamsa, from thy remotest distance have they sat down who love the #law eternal. For thee were dug wells springing from the mountain, which murmuring round about pour #streams of sweetness.

p: @Narasamsa, when first he had his being from #mighty #splendour in supremest $Heaven, #Strong, with his sevenfold mouth, with noise of thunder, with his seven rays, blew and dispersed the darkness.

p: With the loud-shouting band who sang his praises, with thunder, he conquered obstructive Vala. @Narasamsa thundering drave forth the #cattle, the lowing cows who make oblations ready.

p: Serve we with #offers, #gifts, and homage even thus the Steer of all the #Devas, the #Father. @Narasamsa. May we be lords of #riches, with noble #progeny and store of #heroes.

p: Surely that #King by power and #might heroic hath made him #lord of all his foes' posses-ions, who cherishes @Narasamsa well-tended, adorns and worships him as foremost sharer.

p: In his own house he dwells in peace and comfort: to him forever holy #food flows richly. To him the #people with free will pay homage-the #King with whom the Brahman hath precedence.

p: He, unopposed, is #master of the #riches of his own subjects and of hostile #people. The #Devas uphold that #King with their protection who helps the Brahman when he seeks his favour.

p: @Indra, @Narasamsa, rainers of #treasure., rejoicing at this #offering drink the #Soma. Let the abundant #drops sink deep within you: vouchsafe us #riches with full store of #heroes.

p: @Narasamsa and @Indra, make us prospe. May this be your benevolence to us-ward. Assist our holy thoughts, wake up our #spirit: weaken the hatred of our foe and rivals.

hymns.title: HYMN LI. Dawn.
hymns.text:
p: FORTH from the darkness in the region eastward this most abundant splendid #light hatb mounted. Now verily the far-refulgent Mornings, Daughters of $Heaven, bring welfare to the #people.

p: The richly-coloured #Dawns have mounted eastward, like pillars planted at  'our #offerings, and, flushing far, splendid and purifying, unbarred the portals of the fold of darkness.

p: Dispelling gloom this day the wealthy Mornings urge liberal givers to present their #treasure.s. In the unlightened depth of darkness round them let niggard traffickers sleep unawakened.

p: O Devis, is this your #car, I ask you, ancient this day, or is it new, ye Mornings, Wherewith, rich #Dawns, ye seek with #wealth Navagva, Dasagva Angira, the seven-toned #singer?

p: With #horses harnessed by eternal #Order, Devis, swiftly round the worlds ye travel, Arousing from their rest, O #Dawns, the sleeping, and all that lives, #man, #bird, and beast, to motion.

p: Which among these is eldest, and where is she through whom they fixed the @Rbhus' regulations? What time the splendid #Dawns go forth for #splendour, they are not known apart, alike, unwasting.

p: Blest were these #Dawns of old, shining with assist, true with the truth that springs from holy #Order; With whom the toiling #worshipper, by praises, hymning and lauding, soon attained to #riches.

p: Hither from eastward all at once they travel, from one place spreading in the selfsame manner. Awaking, from the seat of holy #Order the @Deva.ike #Dawns come nigh like troops of #cattle.

p: Thus they go forth with undiminished colours, these Mornings similar, in self-same fashion, Concealing the gigantic #might of darkness with radiant bodies bright and pure and shining.

p: O Devis, O $Heaven's refulgent Daughters, bestow upon us #wealth with store of children. As from our pleasant place of rest ye rouse u. May we be #masters of heroic vigour.

p: Well-skilled in lore of #offering, ye Daughters of $Heaven, refulgent #Dawns, I thus address you. May we be #glorious among the #people. May $Heaven vouchsafe us this, and $Earth the Devi,

hymns.title: HYMN LII. Dawn.
hymns.text:
p: THIS Lady, giver of #delight, after her #Sister shining forth, Daughter of $Heaven, hath shown herself.-

p: Unfailing, #Mother of the Kine, in colour like a bright red mare, the @Dawn became the @Asvins' #Friend.

p: Yea, and thou art the @Asvins' #Friend, the #Mother of the Kine art thou: O @Dawn thou rulest over #wealth.

p: Thinking of thee, O joyous One, as her who driveth hate away, We woke to meet thee with our lauds.

p: Our eyes behold thy blessed rays like troops of #cattle loosed to feed. @Dawn hath filled full the wide expanse.

p: When thou hast filled it, Fulgent One! thou layest bare the gloom with #light. After thy nature aid us, @Dawn.

p: Thou overspreadest $Heaven with rays, the dear wide region of $$Mid-#Air. With thy bright shining lustre, @Dawn.

hymns.title: HYMN LIII. Indra, indra, Varuna, and Mitra, Soma, Maghavan, Savitar, Visnu.
hymns.text:
p: OF @Indra, @Indra, @Varuna, and @Mitra, #Soma, @Maghavan, @Savitar, @Visnu the @Deva, the sapient #Asura, we crave this great #gift which is worthy of our choice, Wherewith he freely grants his worshiper defence. This with his rays the Great @Deva.hath vouchsafed to us.

p: Sustainer of the $Heaven, #Lord of the whole world's #life, the #Sage, he putteth on his golden-coloured mail. Clear-sighted, spreading far, filling the spacious realm, @Indra, @Indra, @Varuna, and @Mitra, #Soma, @Maghavan, @Savitar, @Visnu hath brought forth #bliss that deserveth laud.

p: He hath filled full the regions of the $Heaven and $Earth: the @Deva.for his own strengthening waketh up the #hymn. @Indra, @Indra, @Varuna, and @Mitra, #Soma, @Maghavan, @Savitar, @Visnu hath stretched out his arms to cherish #life, producing with his rays and lulling all that moves.

p: Lighting all living creatures, ne’er to be deceived, @Indra, @Indra, @Varuna, and @Mitra, #Soma, @Maghavan, @Savitar, @Visnu, @Deva, protects each holy ordinance. He hath stretched out his arms to all the folk of $Earth, and, with his laws observed, rules his own #mighty course.

p: @Indra, @Indra, @Varuna, and @Mitra, #Soma, @Maghavan, @Savitar, @Visnu thrice surrounding with his mightiness $$Mid-#Air, three regions, and the triple sphere of #light, Sets the three heavens in motion and the threefold $Earth, and willingly protects us with his triple law.

p: Most gracious @Deva, who brings to #life and lulls to rest, he who controls the world, what moves not and what moves, may he vouchsafe us shelter.@Indra, @Indra, @Varuna, and @Mitra, #Soma, @Maghavan, @Savitar, @Visnu the @Deva.for tranquil #life, with triple bar against distress.

p: With the year's #seasons hath @Indra, @Indra, @Varuna, and @Mitra, #Soma, @Maghavan, @Savitar, @Visnu, @Deva, come nigh. May he prosper our #home, give #food and noble #sons. May he invigorate us through the days and nights, an. May he send us opulence with #progeny.

hymns.title: HYMN LIV. Indra, indra, Varuna, and Mitra, Soma, Maghavan, Savitar, Visnu.
hymns.text:
p: Now must we #praise and honour @Indra, @Indra, @Varuna, and @Mitra, #Soma, @Maghavan, @Savitar: at this time of the day the #men must #call to himhim who distributes #wealth to Manu's #progeny, that h. May grant us here #riches most #excellent.

p: For thou at first producest for the holy #Devas the noblest of all portions, immortality: Thereafter as a #gift to #men, O @Indra, @Indra, @Varuna, and @Mitra, #Soma, @Maghavan, @Savitar, @Visnu, thou openest existence, #life succeeding #life.

p: If we, #men as we are, have sinned against the #Devas through want of thought, in weakness, or through insolence, Absolve us from the guilt and make us free from sin, O @Indra, @Indra, @Varuna, and @Mitra, #Soma, @Maghavan, @Savitar, @Visnu, alike among both #Devas and #men.

p: Non. May impede that power of @Indra, @Indra, @Varuna, and @Mitra, #Soma, @Maghavan, @Savitar whereby he will maintain the universal world. What the fair-fingered @Deva.brings forth on $Earth's expanse or in the height of $Heaven, that #work of his stands sure.

p: To lofty hills thou sendest those whom @Indra leads, and givest fixed abodes with houses unto these. However the, may fly and draw themselves apart, still, @Indra, @Indra, @Varuna, and @Mitra, #Soma, @Maghavan, @Savitar, @Visnu, they stand obeying thy behest.

p: May the #libations poured to thee thrice daily, day after day, O @Indra, @Indra, @Varuna, and @Mitra, #Soma, @Maghavan, @Savitar, @Visnu, bring us #blessing. May @Indra. $Heaven, $Earth, @Sindhu with the #Waters, @Aditi with @Adityas, give us shelter.

hymns.title: HYMN LV, Devas.
hymns.text:
p: WHO of you, #Vasus, saveth? who protecteth? O $Heaven and $Earth and @Aditi, preserve us, @Varuna., @Mitra, from the stronger mortal. #Devas, which of you at #offering giveth comfort?

p: They who with laud extol the ancient statutes, when they #shine forth infallible dividers, have ordered as perpetual Ordainers, and beamed as holy-thoughted Wonder-Workers.

p: The Housewife Devi, @Aditi, and @Sindhu, the Devi Svasti I implore for friendship: An. May the unobstructed Night and #Morning both, day and night, provide for our protection.

p: @Aryaman, @Varuna have disclosed the pathway, @Agni as #Lord of Strength the road to welfare. Lauded in manly mod. May @Indra-@Visnu grant us their powerful defence and shelter.

p: I have besought the favour of the #Maruts, of Parvata, of @Bhaga @Deva who rescues. From trouble caused by #man the #Lord preserve us; from woe sent by his #friend let @Mitra save us.

p: Agree, through these our watery oblations, Devis. $Heaven and $Earth, with @Ahibudhnya. As if to win the sea, the Gharma-heaters have opened, as they come anear, the #rivers.

p: May Devi @Aditi with #Devas defend us, save us the saviour @Deva.with care unceasing. We dare not stint the sacred #food of @Mitra and @Varuna upon the back of @Agni.

p: @Agni is Sovran #Lord of #wealth, @Agni of great prosperity: May he bestow these #gifts on us.

p: Hither to us, rich pleasant @Dawn, bring many things to be desired, Thou who hast ample store of #wealth.

p: So the, may @Bhaga, @Indra, @Indra, @Varuna, and @Mitra, #Soma, @Maghavan, @Savitar, @Visnu, @Varuna, @Mitra, @Aryaman, @Indra, with bounty come to us.

hymns.title: HYMN LVI. Heaven and Earth.
hymns.text:
p: MAY #mighty $Heaven and $Earth, most meet for honour, be present here with #light and gleaming splendours; When, fixing them apart, vast, most extensive, the Steer roars loudly in far-reaching courses.

p: The Devis with #Devas, holy with holy, the Two stand pouring out their #rain, exhaustless: Faithful and guileless, having #Devas for children, leaders of #offering with shining splendours.

p: Sure in the worlds he was a skilful Craftsman, he who produced these Twain the $Earth and $Heaven. #Wise, with his power he brought both realms, together spacious and deep, well-fashioned, unsupported.

p: O $Heaven and $Earth, with one accord promoting, with high protection as of Queens, our welfare, Far-reaching, universal, holy, guard us. May we, #car-borne, through #song be victors ever.

p: To both of you, O $Heaven and $Earth, we bring our lofty #song of #praise, pure Ones! to glorify you both.

p: Ye sanctify each other's #form, by your own proper #might ye rule, and from of old observe the Law.

p: Furthering and fulfilling, ye, O #Mighty, perfect @Mitra's Law. Ye sit around  'our #offering.

hymns.title: HYMN LVII. Ksetrapati, Etc.
hymns.text:
p: WE through the #Master of the Field, even as through a #friend, obtain What nourisheth our kine and #steeds. In suc. May he be good to us.

p: As the #cow yieldeth #milk, pour for us freely, #Lord of the Field, the wave that beareth sweetness, Distilling #meath, well-purified like butter, and let the. Lords of holy Law be gracious.

p: Sweet be the plants for us. the heavens, the #waters, and full of sweets for us be #air's mid-region. May the Field's #Lord for us be full of sweetness, an. May we follow after him uninjured.

p: Happily #work our #steers and #men. May the plough furrow happily. Happily be the traces bound; happil. May he ply the goad.

p: Suna and Sira, welcome ye this laud, and with the #milk which ye have made in $Heaven Bedew ye both this $Earth of ours.

p: Auspicious Sita, come thou near: we venerate and #worship thee That tho. Mayst bless and prosper us and bring us fruits abundantly.

p: May @Indra press the furrow down. May @Pusan guide its course aright. May she, as rich in #milk, be drained for us through each succeeding year.

p: Happily let the shares turn up the plough-land, happily go the ploughers with the oxen. With #meath and #milk @Parjanya make us happy. Grant us prosperity, Suna and Sira.

hymns.title: HYMN LVIII. Ghrta.
hymns.text:
p: FORTH from the $Ocean sprang the wave of sweetness: together with the stalk it turned to Amrta, that which is holy oil's mysterious title: but the #Devas’ tongue is truly Amrta's centre.

p: Let us declare aloud the name of Ghrta, and at this #offering hold it up with homage. So let the Brahman hear the #praise we utter. This hath the four-horned Buffalo emitted.

p: Four are his horns, three are the feet that bear him; his heads are two, his hands are seven in number. Bound with a triple bond the Steer roars loudly: the #mighty @Deva.hath entered in to mortals.

p: That oil in triple shape the #Devas discovered laid down within the #Cow, concealed by #Panis. @Indra produced one shape, @Surya another: by their own power they formed the third from Vena.

p: From inmost #reservoir in countless channels #flow down these #rivers which the foe beholds not. I look upon the #streams of oil descending, and lo! the Golden Reed is there among them.

p: Like #rivers our #libations #flow together, cleansing themselves in inmost heart and #spirit. The #streams of holy oil pour swiftly downward like the wild beasts that fly before the bowman.

p: As rushing down the rapids of a #river, #flow swifter than the wind the vigorous currents, the #streams of oil in swelling fluctuation like a red courser bursting through the fences.

p: Like women at a gathering fair to look on and gently smiling, they incline to @Agni. The #streams of holy oil attain the fuel, and #Jatavedas joyfully receives them.

p: As maidens dock themselves with gay adornment to join the #bridal feast, I now behold them. Where #Soma flows and #offering is ready, thither the #streams of holy oil are running.

p: Send to our eulogy a herd of #cattle bestow upon us #excellent possessions. Bear to the #Devas  'the #offering we offer the #streams of oil #flow pure and full of sweetness.

p: The universe depends upon thy power and #might within the sea, within the heart, within all #life.
